name: Broken Rainbow
description:
The World is dead 

Join the lone mage Blank in his journey to find the forbidden Color Stains. Meet your few last friends, face the grief itself and slay those who stand in your way as you bring the colorless world and everyone who survived in it the long awaited peace.

Everyone abandoned you

Blank is beyond help. You won't find new party members on your travels, and every adversary you will face at your own. Learn to be alone or perish.

Harness the power of Colors

Blank wields the power to command an ancient mistake known only as Colors. Use them to maul your enemies, seal your wounds and overcome your Trauma. In the world of darkness only you control the shades of light.

The World is dead and our god hates us.

There is no hope and The Rainbow is Broken.
